info: Worked in the design and development of UI and its functionalities for an online trading platform named Traddle.io. Key features includes implementing the Sidebar and Avatar Selection.
Developed an intuitive Figma Prototype for an ongoing real estate valuation platform, ensuring a user-friendly interface for order creation and editing within a data-intensive table
Developing a burgeoning personal fashion branding online portfolio, ensuring seamless navigation and visual appeal for showcasing diverse collections and design aesthetics.
